channel.title: Update on M.J. Tattersall Author's Page
channel.description: Recent content in Update on M.J. Tattersall Author's Page

item.title: Welcome to my website
item.description: Hello. Welcome to my website. Here you will find information relating to my work as a novelist and academic. Please feel free to check out my professional links, and posts containing updates on my work to date. The site is completely barebones at the minute as I am in the (very slow) process of creating a website with no prior coding experiences. All languages are beautiful–even computer-speak– but it’s always hard work learning new ones.
